name: Half Moon Bay
preparation:
Fever-Tree’s Half Moon Bay is the rare drink in which the mixer is made with the same care, if not more, than the base spirit. Don’t use anything other than Fever-Tree Spiced Orange ginger ale, made with cold-pressed South African clementines and steam-distilled cinnamon from Sri Lanka. Simply combine it with Lillet blanc for a delightfully refreshing apéritif.

Pour the liqueur into a highball glass and add ice.

Top with the ginger ale.

Garnish with an orange wedge.
